com.a0xffffffff.dinesum

Class FirebaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.a0xffffffff.dinesum.FirebaseManager

  • public class FirebaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Interacts directly with Firebase Realtime Database. Serves as an interface for other parts of the system to write to or read from Firebase.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • attachFirebaseListeners

        public void attachFirebaseListeners(java.lang.String userID,
                                    java.lang.String userCity)
        Attach listeners to Firebase to fetch request objects when changes in Firebase database occur. Listeners are for all requests, nearby requests in the same city as the user, requests created by the user, and requests claimed/completed by the user.
        Parameters:
        userID - The current user's unique Facebook ID.
        userCity - The user's current city based on their Android location.

      • attachInitialFirebaseListeners

        public void attachInitialFirebaseListeners(java.lang.String userID,
                                           java.lang.String userCity)
        Attach listeners to Firebase to fetch request objects during initial data pull from Firebase database after user logs into the app upon startup. Listeners are for all requests, nearby requests in the same city as the user, requests created by the user, and requests claimed/completed by the user.
        Parameters:
        userID - The current user's Facebook ID.
        userCity - The user's current city based on their Android location.

      • parseRequestJson

        public Request parseRequestJson(com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot requestSnapshot)
        Parse JSON object from database into a Request object.
        Parameters:
        requestSnapshot - JSON object describing request read from Firebase.
        Returns:
        Returns Request object with request data contained in the JSON object.

      • parseUserJson

        public static User parseUserJson(com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot userSnapshot)
        Parse JSON object from database into a User object.
        Parameters:
        userSnapshot - JSON object describing user read from Firebase.
        Returns:
        Returns User object with user ID and rating contained in the JSON object.

      • getRequestDatabase

        public com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference getRequestDatabase()
        Gets reference to the request node in Firebase.
        Returns:
        Returns the request node reference.

        public com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference getUserDatabase()
        Gets reference to the user node in Firebase.
        Returns:
        Returns the user node reference.

        public boolean writeRequest(Request request)
        Writes a Request object to the database.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Returns true if write succeeds.
